name: Stage 1
description: Sailing stage crossing the English channel. 230 nm in 8 days.

name: Stage 2
description: Motoring through the canals of Belgium and the Netherlands. 180 nm in 8 days.

name: Stage 3
description: One week of city exploration and cultural activities in Amsterdam. Welcome guests on board. Daytrips motoring in the surrounding area.

name: Stage 4
description: 150+ nm sailing and motoring stage from Amsterdam to Eems. Passing the Frisian islands. 15 days.

name: Stage 5
description: Sailing and motoring stage providing a mix of nice sailing in protected waters and open sea sailing crossing the Kielerkanal to Kiel. 150+ nm in 8 days.

name: Stage 6
description: Pure sailing stage crossing the Kattegat sea area to Aarhus. 150 nm in 15 days. Get into the vibe of Viking voyages!

name: Stage 7
description: Sailing stage to the significant viking site of Roskilde. 120 nm in 8 days.

name: Stage 8
description: One week in Roskilde with cultural activities, sightseeing and daytrips in the surrounding area. Invide guests on board.

name: Stage 9
description: Open sea sailing stage crossing the Kattegat to Aalborg. 150 nm in 8 days.

name: Stage 10
description: Sailing stage with a stop in Isle of Hl´€r during the crossing. 150 nm in 8 days.

name: Stage 11
description: Sailing stage from Gothenburg to Karlstad, motoring parts of the way up the Göta älv and Vänern lake. 160+ nm in 15 days.
